slides.section_body: True happiness often comes from overcoming challenges rather than seeking comfort. Completing a difficult task can bring more joy than momentary pleasures like indulging in dessert. The experiences that shape us often come from facing struggles head-on.
slides.quote: Struggle leads to the most beautiful moments in life.

slides.section_body: Good values are based on reality, constructive, and within our control, while bad values are superstitious, destructive, and not controllable. The values we prioritize shape our happiness and define our well-being.
slides.quote: Values shape the way we live our lives.

slides.section_body: Healthy values include honesty, vulnerability, and creativity. These values are achievable internally and enhance our engagement with reality, leading to genuine fulfillment and happiness.
slides.quote: Honesty and creativity can be experienced right now.

slides.section_body: Bad values often rely on external factors and can lead to dissatisfaction. Values such as wanting to be liked by everyone or seeking superficial pleasures ultimately lead to frustration.
slides.quote: Bad values lie outside of your control.

slides.section_body: Understanding what we prioritize in life informs our decisions and shapes our happiness. Distinguishing between fleeting desires and meaningful values is crucial.
slides.quote: Your priorities define your life's direction.

slides.section_body: Poor values lead us to focus on things that do not matter, pushing us into cycles of stress and anxiety. Choosing better values allows us to reallocate our efforts toward what truly improves our lives.
Learning to see life through the lens of better values can change our experiences. Like Pete Best, those who adjust their values can find deeper joy and fulfillment.
slides.quote: Reprioritizing values opens new pathways to happiness.

slides.section_body: Success should not be defined by societal standards, but by personal satisfaction derived from meaningful struggles. The way we measure success influences our overall happiness.
slides.quote: True success comes from fulfilling meaningful values.

slides.section_body: Self-improvement is all about choosing better values. By focusing on what matters, we create better lives filled with problems that lead to greater growth and satisfaction.
slides.quote: Better values lead to better problems.

slides.section_body: The next chapters will explore five counterintuitive values necessary for personal growth. These values may be uncomfortable but are essential for achieving a fulfilling life.
slides.quote: Embrace the uncomfortable for true transformation.
